item.description:
This is a small restaurant serving "a modern 'cuisine classique' without the limitations of preconceived flavor combination or construct."

The money stuff:
There is a fee of $21 to register for this dinner. Of that, $20 is a deposit, which will be returned to you at the restaurant (in cash). If you say that you're coming and then don't, you forfeit the $20. The remaining $1 is a non-refundable fee. Part of this goes to Amazon Payments because they charge a transaction fee for the payment, and part of it will go to Meetup to help pay for the group's website.

There are two ways to pay the deposit:
1 – Online via the Euro Meetup website
2 – In cash, by meeting me at a mutually convenient time and place (probably near Harvard Square). If you want to pay cash, send me an email so that we can arrange a time & place to meet. The website won't offer cash as an option, it only knows about what happens online. I'll need to sign you up for the dinner.

When I posted this event on the website, I also sent an email to everyone in the group with more details about the restaurant. If you'd like me to send it to you again, use the link next to "Who's hosting?"
item.how_to_find_us: Our table will take up half the restaurant. If you need to ask, ask for the Euro group.

group.name: The Boston Euro Social Meetup Group

item.name: Restaurant Week
